def_cn: 旗舰;(尤指指挥官所在的)主舰
def_en: A flagship is the most important ship in a fleet of ships, especially the one on which the commander of the fleet is sailing.

def_cn: 王牌;主打产品;旗舰产品
def_en: The flagship of a group of things that are owned or produced by a particular organization is the most important one.
